spec.name: l'Hermitage Garden
spec.description: L'Hermitage Garden (Jardin de l'Hermitage) is a sizable public park located in the L'Hermitage neighborhood of Casablanca. It serves as a vital green lung and recreational space for the surrounding residential area. The park provides shaded walking paths, open lawns, and leisure amenities, making it a popular spot for families, joggers, and anyone seeking a natural environment in the dense city.
